DOC.brief_title: Eicosapentaenoic Acid ( EPA ) Docosahexaenoic Acid Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male surgically sterile female age 2170 . Body Mass Index 2035 . Plasma Lipoprotein Associated Phospholipase A2 ( LpPLA2 ) value > 200 ng/ml . Competitive exerciser . Current smoker . Those already take dietary supplement ( EPA , DHA , flax seed oil , fish oil , cod liver oil , weight control product , high dos vitamin C ( > 500 mg/day ) vitamin E ( > 400 mg/day ) . Those consume 3 oily fish species/week . Those consume > 2 drink contain alcohol/day . Those take medication could affect serum lipid body weight , take coumadin 325 mg/day aspirin could effect bleed time coagulation profile . History bleed disorder . History significant cardiac , renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neoplastic , biliary endocrine disorder include uncontrolled diabetes , thyroid disease , hypertension . Plasma LpPLA2 value < 200 ng/ml .
